channel.title: How do you make a rsc client ( please read before you report,etc. )
channel.description:
I know this is only for 317, but I don't know where to put it.
Have you EVER played Silabsoft?
You know they have their own you know client.
Like the cheesy 'ALWAYS AHEAD OF THE REST!' Saying?
How do they do it?
IF you think that's impossible for me, how do you make those things like Loomscape AKA BoxRune???
Well instead of RS2 I want RSC
Is that EVEN Possible?
I mean don't piss me off with douche or anything.
Reply a tut or a tut link PLEASE!
Pics would be helpful
- Runeisim
Don't know?
How do you make a client like X-Scape Webclient or something.

Read full topic
